trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection" /> interface provides methods that indicate whether a client is authorized to connect on the current channel, based on the client's network address and user identity.
trans-unit.target: L'interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection" /> fornisce i metodi che indicano se un client è autorizzato a eseguire la connessione al canale corrente, in base all'identità utente e all'indirizzo di rete del client.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interface is passed to <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interfaccia viene passata a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.

trans-unit.source: It provides a single point of authorization for all incoming connections on a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un singolo punto di autorizzazione per tutte le connessioni in ingresso su un <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.

trans-unit.source: It allows for the authorization of the caller before any incoming messages are deserialized to minimize the security threat from untrusted sources.
trans-unit.target: Consente l'autorizzazione del chiamante prima dei messaggi in arrivo vengono deserializzati per ridurre al minimo i rischi di sicurezza da origini non attendibili.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" /> that identifies the network address of the client.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" /> che identifica l'indirizzo di rete del client.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the network address of the client is authorized to connect on the current channel.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore Boolean che indica se l'indirizzo di rete del client è autorizzato a eseguire la connessione sul canale corrente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the network address of the client is authorized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'indirizzo di rete del client è autorizzato; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interface is passed to <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interfaccia viene passata a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.

trans-unit.source: It provides a single point of authorization for all incoming connections on a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un singolo punto di autorizzazione per tutte le connessioni in ingresso su un <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.

trans-unit.source: It allows for the authorization of the caller before any incoming messages are deserialized to minimize the security threat from untrusted sources.
trans-unit.target: Consente l'autorizzazione del chiamante prima dei messaggi in arrivo vengono deserializzati per ridurre al minimo i rischi di sicurezza da origini non attendibili.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity" /> that represents the user identity of the client.
trans-unit.target: Interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity" /> che rappresenta l'identità utente del client.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the user identity of the client is authorized to connect on the current channel.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore Boolean che indica se l'identità utente del client è autorizzata a eseguire la connessione sul canale corrente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user identity of the client is authorized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'identità utente del client è autorizzata; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interface is passed to <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interfaccia viene passata a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.

trans-unit.source: It provides a single point of authorization for all incoming connections on a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un singolo punto di autorizzazione per tutte le connessioni in ingresso su un <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.

trans-unit.source: It allows for the authorization of the caller before any incoming messages are deserialized to minimize the security threat from untrusted sources.
trans-unit.target: Consente l'autorizzazione del chiamante prima dei messaggi in arrivo vengono deserializzati per ridurre al minimo i rischi di sicurezza da origini non attendibili.
